Name: Mining Licence
Descriptions: Allows the holder to buy pickaxes and break rocks and ore deposits.
Allows the holder to craft a better pickaxe.
Allows the holder to craft a better pickaxe.

Name: Logging Licence
Descriptions: Allows the holder to buy axes and chop down trees.
Allows the holder to craft a better axe and unlocks Brewing Licence
Allows the holder to craft a better axe.

Name: Fishing Licence
Descriptions: Allows holder to buy fishing rods and catch fish.
Allows the holder to see bubbles created by underwater creatures. Unlocks a new fishing rod recipe
Allows the holder to craft Crab Pots. Unlocks a new fishing rod recipe.

Name: Hunting Licence
Descriptions: Allows the holder to craft basic weapons.
Allows the holder to craft better weapons. Unlocks trapping Licence.
Allows the holder to craft better weapons using animal drops. Animals have an even higher chance to drop other useful items when hunted.

Name: Landscaping Licence
Descriptions: Allows the holder to craft new pathing options.
Allows the holder to craft new fencing options.

Name: Metal Detecting
Descriptions: Allows the holder to buy a metal detector and search for treasure around the island.
Allows the holder to notice some buried items using sight alone.

Name: Vehicle Licence
Descriptions: Allows the holder to purchase and pilot water vehicles.
Allows the holder to purchase and drive land vehicles.
Allows the holder to purchase and pilot flying vehicles.

Name: Commerce Licence
Descriptions: The holder will receive 5% more when selling items
The holder will receive 10% more when selling items
The holder will receive 15% more when selling items

Name: Handling Licence
Descriptions: Allows the holder to buy and raise Chooks.
Allows the holder to buy and raise Vombats.
Allows the holder to buy raise Pleep.

Name: Building Licence
Descriptions: Allows the holder to craft simple bridges.
Allows the holder to build Windmills to help speed up production tasks.
Coming soon. The holder will get instant access to Building Level 3 once it has arrived

Name: Farming Licence
Descriptions: Allows the holder to buy farming equipment and seeds.
Allows the holder to craft fertilzer. Unlocks a new watercan recipe.
Allows the holder to access irregation licence. Unlocks a new watercan recipe.

Name: Cargo Licence
Descriptions: Allows the holder to expand their pockets by 3 slots.
Allows the holder to expand their pockets by 3 slots.
Allows the holder to expand their pockets by 3 slots.

Name: Deep Mining Licence
Descriptions: Unlocks the Mine Deed and allows access to the deep mines.

Name: Toolbelt Licence
Descriptions: Allow the holder to expand their toolbelt slots by 1.
Allow the holder to expand their toolbelt slots by 1.
Allow the holder to expand their toolbelt slots by 1.

Name: Trapping Licence
Descriptions: Allows the holder to craft and use animal traps and animal drop off points. Animals successfully dropped off will give a reward.
Allows the holder to craft and use advanced animal traps.

Name: Excavation Licence
Descriptions: Allows the holder to purchase and use shovels.

Name: Irrigation Licence
Descriptions: Allows the holder to craft sprinklers and water tanks.
Allows the holder to craft improved sprinklers.

Name: Agricultural Vehicle Licence
Descriptions: Allows the holder to purchase Agricultural Vehicles and use the Harvesting Attachment
Allows the holder to use the Plowing Attachment on Agricultural Vehicles.
Allows the holder to use the Planting Attachment on Agricultural Vehicles.

Name: Sign Writing Licence
Descriptions: Unlocked the recipe for The Sign Writing Table and simple sign recipes
Unlocks the recipes for advanced signs

Name: Water Scaping Licence
Descriptions: Unlocks the recipes for Waterbeds. Used to create waterfalls.

Name: Brewing Licence
Descriptions: Unlocks the Billy Kit recipe used for brewing drinks and jams.
Unlocks the Keg recipe used for brewing advanced drinks.

Name: Animal Processing Licence
Descriptions: Unlocks Cheese Making recipe for processing Milk.
Unlocks Spinning Wheel recipe for processing Wool.
